note: 70 revert commits in 120d; CFR > 100% likely due to backport-style reverts. Keep out of aggregate CFR medians until classified.
Median MTTR 152h with ~76% CFR; investigate weekly release cadence before storytelling.
<1 deploy/week in 120d slice and 5 reversions; treat CFR as exploratory only.
12 reverts / ~17.3 scaled deploys = 69% CFR. Reverts are genuine production rollbacks, but low deploy volume (1/week in 120d) inflates the ratio. Exclude from CFR median.
8 reverts / ~5.8 scaled deploys = 138% raw CFR (capped at 100%). Sub-weekly deploy rate (0.34/week) with 3 reverts missing originalDate suggests backport cleanup. Exclude from CFR median.
3 reverts / ~6.5 scaled deploys = 46% CFR. Sub-weekly deploy rate (0.38/week). Reverts are genuine but sparse deploys inflate CFR. Exclude from CFR median.
1 revert / ~3.4 scaled deploys = 30% CFR. Sub-weekly deploy rate (0.20/week) with 321 merged PRs suggests deploy detection is incomplete. Exclude from CFR median.
